title: Launch of UAE-Built Global AI Marketplace by IHC
description: IHC launched a pioneering artificial intelligence marketplace powered by the first Emirati AI Marketplace Agent named 'SAIF'. This marketplace, built in the UAE for global use, enables developers worldwide to access and directly purchase GPUs, AI modules, and custom AI stack designs. SAIF supports over 5,000 languages and multiple access modes such as voice, text, and video call. The initiative aims to expand access to AI technology and computational power, facilitating developers, companies, governments, and non-profit institutions in AI deployment, aligning with the UAE’s AI 2031 vision and digital economy strategy.
source_name: IHC Launches UAE-Built Global Marketplace for AI to Accelerate Access to Advanced Intelligence

opportunities.title: Integration of Niche AI Models onto the Marketplace
opportunities.description: Companies specializing in sector-specific AI algorithms (e.g., for finance, healthcare, or logistics) can integrate and sell their proprietary AI modules on the UAE-built marketplace, expanding reach to a global customer base. This direct-to-market approach is realistic given the marketplace’s open architecture and global focus, and allows AI developers to monetize specialized solutions.
roadmap_steps: Identify sector-specific AI models that align with marketplace demand.
Adapt and package models per marketplace integration requirements.
Establish account and profile on the AI marketplace.
Develop marketing materials and support documentation.
Provide ongoing updates and technical support for their models.

opportunities.title: Cloud GPU Providers Supplying Compute Resources
opportunities.description: Cloud infrastructure companies can list their GPU resources for rent via the marketplace, tapping into new demand from global AI developers. The marketplace’s direct GPU purchasing functionality makes it feasible for GPU vendors not already listed to reach a worldwide clientele with flexible offerings.
roadmap_steps: Contact IHC marketplace business development team.
Negotiate terms for listing GPU resources.
Integrate provisioning APIs or inventory listings.
Set up payment and billing solutions.
Launch and monitor performance, adjusting resources as needed.

opportunities.title: AI-Powered Financial Tools for Marketplace Transactions
opportunities.description: Fintech companies can offer AI-driven payment solutions, fraud detection, and compliance modules tailored for marketplace transactions. Given the financial flows and multi-currency support required, integrating advanced fintech tools can streamline operations and build trust for global buyers and sellers.
roadmap_steps: Research financial requirements and gaps in current marketplace transaction processes.
Design or adapt financial technology modules for marketplace integration.
Pitch solution to marketplace management.
Work with technical teams for API integration and compliance checks.
Launch and provide post-integration support.

opportunities.title: Healthcare AI Vendor Portal for Specialized Modules
opportunities.description: Medical AI software providers can collaborate to establish a dedicated healthcare AI section within the marketplace, offering clinical diagnostic models, imaging analysis, and medical data processing solutions. The global, multilingual platform is advantageous for scaling such solutions to healthcare providers and researchers worldwide.
roadmap_steps: Catalog existing healthcare AI modules suitable for external licensing.
Ensure regulatory compliance for global distribution.
Negotiate partnership criteria for a healthcare vendor portal.
Upload and manage healthcare modules through the marketplace dashboard.
Market the solutions to the marketplace user base.

opportunities.title: IT Service Companies Offering Marketplace Integration Support
opportunities.description: IT consultancies can offer end-to-end onboarding, maintenance, and support packages for businesses wanting to join the AI marketplace but lacking technical expertise. This practical solution leverages the marketplace’s expanding user base and caters to small to medium enterprises seeking a managed approach.
roadmap_steps: Develop standardized onboarding and support service packages.
Market services to potential marketplace participants.
Provide technical evaluation and integration of client offerings.
Set up monitoring and ongoing support infrastructure.
Collect client feedback to refine service offerings.
